title: Ep. #106 | March 2021 Comebacks Part 2
description:
Eric updates everyone on almost getting scammed by aesthetic-looking Instagram cookware, his seclusion in a hotel room, and whether or not his next album will be considered K-Pop. And he also gets into more March comebacks from Park Bom (박봄), Kim Sejeong (김세정), and pH-1. Along with some special shout outs to CLC's Sorn and MRSHLL!
